name: Cheesy Bacon and Egg Brunch Casserole
author: McCormick Spice
summary: This one-dish brunch casserole is ideal for a crowd. Add a fruit salad and you can sit back and enjoy your company.
ingredients: 1 loaf Italian bread, cut into 1-inch cubes
¼ teaspoon McCormick® Black Pepper, Ground
directions: Cook bacon in large skillet until crisp
Drain bacon on paper towels; crumble and set aside
Add onion to drippings in skillet; cook and stir 3 minutes or until softened
Spread 1/2 of the bread cubes in 13x9-inch baking dish
Layer with 1/2 each of the onion, bacon, Cheddar cheese and mozzarella cheese
Top with remaining bread cubes, onion, bacon, Cheddar cheese and mozzarella cheese
Beat eggs in medium bowl until foamy
Add milk, mustard, nutmeg and pepper; beat until well blended
Press bread cubes lightly into egg mixture until completely covered
Bake 40 to 50 minutes or until center is set and top is golden brown
